title.rendered: [Minecraft] Summer 2022 Advance Notice: Current owners of Minecraft (PC) will receive either: Java edition or Bedrock version for free

content.rendered:
Minecraft: 2 for 1 action ⛏🧱
On the official website for the coming summer announced a special promotion where you can buy in/at the Owning/purchasing Minecraft additionally one Present code receives. PC players of the Java Edition get the Windows version “Bedrock Edition” for free or vice versa. Please note that this is a pre-announcement without an exact start date, it is only referred to the summer (in the northern hemisphere). For your orientation, it starts on June 21st this year. When the campaign has started, you will be informed accordingly here.

Bundle – Options

(1) Minecraft: Java Edition owners get: Minecraft: Bedrock Edition for Windows for free

(2) Minecraft: Java Edition owners get: Minecraft: Bedrock Edition for Windows for free

(3) When you buy a game – you get both versions as a bundle

On the one hand, there is a version exclusively for Windows 10 (also called Bedrock Edition). This is only available in the Microsoft Store for €29.99. In addition, there is the well-known Java version (23.95€).

Basically, both versions support texture packs. However, the Java version has a clear advantage here. It has been around much longer and is therefore better supported by developers. However, the very popular shaders, which greatly enhance the game’s visuals, are only available in the Java version.
While there is a marketplace in the Windows 10 version where you can purchase paid skins, texture packs and worlds, this does not exist on Java. Here 99% of all packs can be downloaded for free from the Internet. Advantage Windows: with the Bedrock Edition you can play together on Windows 10, the Xbox One and the Nintendo Switch, since all of these platforms support crossplay.

a notice: Buyers of the Java edition before October 29, 2018 will already get the Bedrock version for Windows 10 for free! Simply log in to the Minecraft website with your Mojang account and link your Microsoft account.
